description:
Are you a seasoned, business-savvy leader with a passion for mobile gaming? Activision is looking for a Senior Manager, Global Mobile Business Development to take its mobile gaming to the next level. We’re looking for someone with a proven track record of success who will bring fresh ideas, enthusiasm, and strategic vision to the team. As a Senior Manager, you will have the chance to be part of a worldwide leader in interactive entertainment.The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 8 years of experience in developing mobile strategies, including working with publishers, developers, and other partners; a deep understanding of the mobile gaming industry; and a solid background in digital media and business development. A passion for gaming and a creative, out-of-the-box approach to problem solving are essential. If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you!

Activision is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
